audioText: Je penserai terriblement à ce coup dur quand je reviendrai de voyage la semaine prochaine.
question: When will the speaker think about the difficult situation?
options: When they return from their trip next week
Before they leave on their journey
After they finish their work project
explanation: The text states 'Je penserai terriblement à ce coup dur quand je reviendrai de voyage la semaine prochaine' - I will think terribly about this hard blow when I return from my trip next week. 'Penserai' is the future tense of penser (to think), 'terriblement' means terribly/extremely, and 'coup' means blow/strike (in 'coup dur' = hard blow/setback).
source: Travel and personal reflection on difficult situations
